event.descr:
When an alarm occurred, send the trap PDU to uniform network manager. Through the configuration command alarm trap-oid-expand, the trap OID can be expanded, adding alarm status and code.

curAlarmCode %parm[#2]%;

event.descr:
When an alarm occurred, send the trap PDU to uniform network manager. Through the configuration command alarm trap-oid-expand, the trap OID can be expanded, adding alarm status and code.

curAlarmFlowID %parm[#1]%;

curAlarmCode %parm[#2]%;

emergency(1) alert(2) critical(3) error(4) warning(5) notification(6) information(7) debugging(8) invalid(9) all(255)

event.descr:
When a notification occurred, send the trap PDU to uniform network manager. Through the configuration command alarm trap-oid-expand, the trap OID can be expanded, adding notification status and code.

notificationFlowID %parm[#1]%;

notificationAlmCode %parm[#2]%;

notificationAlmNetID %parm[#13]%;

event.descr:
When an alarm preload canceled, send the trap PDU to uniform network manager.

zxr10AlarmPreloadInterface %parm[#1]%;
